snippet.title: Warlander - Release date announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Play as a resurrected hero on the road of vengeance. Every path you explore in the procedurally generated world is different, full of dangers and opportunities alike. Aim precisely and slice through the flesh of your enemies in a unique take on stamina-based combat! Progress by becoming stronger and more skillful, either by chopping your way across the battlefield or by using abilities to turn the environment into a deadly weapon. Sacrifice enemies to appease the ancient god and get access to powers based on ancient druidic magic. If you die - you will be returned to life - at the cost of your progress and experience.

You live to fight another day, over and over again… so that eternally hungry deity may receive offerings in blood!

Slicing beings on February 26, 2020!

Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1054040/Warlander/

Check the latest news on our webpage, Facebook and Twitter:
Webpage: https://warlandergame.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warlandergame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/warlandergame

Talk to us on Discord: https://discord.gg/GabjUeb
